name: The Lost Spirits
description:
The Lost Spirits is a 2D platformer. You have to kill the enemies to set the their spirits free (Their spirits are lost in the world). 

TIPS: There are 2 bosses and 6 weapons to collect. You have to shoot the green button on the menu to start the game :)

This is a Game I made in 3 days for the Game Jam called Mini Jam 25. The theme was Spirits and I couldn't use any text in the game.
